name: Caza Oil & Gas, Inc.
description: Caza Oil & Gas, Inc. is an independent oil and natural gas exploration and production company based in the United States. Founded in 2003, Caza focuses on the acquisition, exploration, and development of oil and gas properties, primarily in the prolific regions of the United States. The company operates with a commitment to responsible resource development and aims to optimize its asset portfolio through strategic drilling programs and advanced technology. Caza’s operations are primarily concentrated in the Midland Basin and Delaware Basin of West Texas, which are known for their high-quality oil reserves. The company employs a range of techniques to enhance production, including horizontal drilling and hydraulic fracturing, ensuring efficient extraction of oil and gas resources. Caza Oil & Gas is dedicated to maintaining high environmental standards and engaging with local communities to promote sustainable development. With a team of experienced industry professionals, Caza strives to grow its production and reserves while delivering value to its shareholders through prudent financial management and strategic asset development. The company’s long-term strategy includes expanding its operational footprint and exploring new opportunities in energy markets, while adapting to the evolving landscape of the oil and gas industry.

seo.meta_title: Caza Oil & Gas, Inc. | Independent Oil and Natural Gas Exploration
seo.meta_description: Caza Oil & Gas, Inc. is an independent oil and natural gas company focused on exploration and production in the US. Discover our operations, strategy, and commitment to sustainability.

faq.question: What does Caza Oil & Gas do?
faq.answer: Caza Oil & Gas is involved in the exploration and production of oil and natural gas properties in the United States.

faq.question: Where is Caza Oil & Gas headquartered?
faq.answer: Caza Oil & Gas is headquartered in Houston, Texas, USA.

faq.question: What are the main areas of operation for Caza Oil & Gas?
faq.answer: Caza primarily operates in the Midland Basin and Delaware Basin in West Texas.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Caza Oil & Gas?
faq.answer: Dr. David J. Hargreaves is the CEO of Caza Oil & Gas, Inc.

faq.question: When was Caza Oil & Gas founded?
faq.answer: Caza Oil & Gas was founded in 2003.
